name: Legends from Lacoytas: The First Seeker
name_original: Legends from Lacoytas: The First Seeker
description:
Legends from Lacoytas: The First Seeker is a challenging top down shooter where you are given a crossbow and sword to shoot and slash your way through unique enemies.

Features

  • Challenging combat that requires players to constantly adapt based on their available weapons and the current enemies.
  • At least 4 normal enemies.
  • At least 4 bosses.
  • A short story focused mode in which you will save a village from local bandits and can learn more about the protagonist.
  • An endless mode where you will fight infinite waves of randomly selected enemies. What's the highest score you can achieve?
  • An overpowered floor.
